content.prompt: Which of the following best explains a limitation in Mumfordâ€™s critique of postwar suburbanization?

choices.label: Many families moved to the new suburbs to find affordable homes.
The federal government allocated many new subdivisions for public housing.
Many African American and Latino American families moved to the new suburbs.
The federal government recognized suburban sprawl as an environmental concern.

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
